Guest Lecture from NCSA AVL on SciViz

A guest lecture about scientific visualization.

Optional reading list

  1. Altair Docs - in particular Including Indexes, Interactivity & Selections, Multi-line tooltips, Interactive Binning, Filter Transformations, Geographic plots, and Fold Transformations
  2. VAD Ch. 8.4-8.6: Arrange Spatial Data
  3. VAD Ch. 11.6: Manipulate View
  4. yt docs
  5. yt Volume Rendering Tutorial

Data

Corgis per country over time

This dataset is from the Cardigan Archives and scraped using Beautiful Soup in Python and further processed in Python into this form.

Subset of full Corgi database

This dataset is from the Cardigan Archives and scraped using Beautiful Soup in Python and further processed in Python into this form.
